column5: the pro is a good place but not always the best priced place..i know they price match but you have to prove to them the price from the other store is less and no flyers show the other stores entire price list.. for example le baron has.. fishing line, dipsy divers, lures ,rods and other products for less and they are not listed in any special flyer, so if you happen to be at the pro take a look at what you want then price it at le baron and see.. dont get me wrong i love the pro but i also hate buying something for more money if i dont have to, besides this is a place to help others who love fishing like me and i hope i helped..thanks..

here's a good example:  the boating safety kit. the one in the orange container. i saw it a few years ago at bass pro for $24.99 i informed the manager of the fishing dept that the exact same kit was $11.99 at ctc and $9.99 at walmart. she said she couldn't do anything about the price because head office sets the price. she said she would let them know. 1 year later I'm in bass pro and its still $24.99 the next year its still the same. i forgot about it when i was in there the other day to check and see if they woke up yet.
If my wife did that to me. I look would look into her eye's and say very sweetly ok what did you buy and how much did it cost me.
If your wife has a single sister with that same great attitude,im sure there are plenty of guys aroud here that would be interested.
Careful Steve...you might get in over your head if Debbe sees this...
Now that is a sugar moma!  You must be a pro at massaging bunions..  nough said.

Thanks for the replies guy's. now maybe you guy's can help me out? my wife's birthday is jan 16th, I'm taking her to mother tuckers for her birthday dinner. what i really need help with , is what to get her for her birthday. do i get her a new toaster or a bass pro gift card????
I'd say she's got you and that's enough... but that would be an outright lie Dann !!!  They sell a nice camo teddy at BPS... or is it Cabellas... it works so well I never see it...
not in stock
I see you still need guidance Dann. Here's a hint. NEVER buy a woman anything with a cord...EVER!
How's about battery operated Roy?
Miss Kelly says: corded with battery back up just incase the power goes out!
ya better get one of these then... gift idea

My wife gave me a $50 gift card for bass pro for xmas. now I'm all excited cause i want a sled to pull my gear out with that is less bulkyer then the one i built. i go on to there web site and cant find any sleds, now I'm bummed out. this morning she says , lets go and see if you can find something else you might want. ok, so off we go but im not excited cause i really don't need anything else. we get there and start looking, float suits,rods,lures blah blah blah. well there some of those badboyz that everyone talks about, $3-$6 each. i am not spending $50 on lures and that's that....... walk over to look at the portable huts(just to kill time) I'm looking inside the clam base and i hear her say, "are those the sleds you were talking about?" stacks of 4 different size OTTER sleds. she goes over to the monster sled and says, is this big enough? the kind that have a tow bar on the front. $269---NOT then she says , what about this one. its the next size down, ya and how much is that one? $74.99 she says,, say what let me see, hmmmm 64"x29"x11" well that would probably do but its $25 more then my gift card. then she says , if you want it ,get it and i will pay the extra for it I pick one up and start to head for the cashier. but what about those lures you said you liked? i know have the sled and 6 badboyz in my tackle box.........
You're a suck Dann.. plan and simple!
she is a good women
You are both correct...LOL
Always trust people who wear yellow.
You have the coolest partner Skeet Now you need to bring her out to enjoy your good fortune  You're one lucky dude if you ask me Leechman
Love it when your master plan follows through....
Sweet Deal!!!
Yep.... what kind of face did u use on her?  I may borrow it to use on my wife too
You want to hang onto that lady Dann, you've got yourself a real winner there !!
Spoiled rotten is what my wife would say...
My wife and I were there today. Same story. $50 gift card didn't cover the new baitcast reel and hardware for making my own lures... Wifey comes through in the checkout aisle!!!

I found one like that 30 years ago. My words to this day are "I love you more today than I did yesterday but less than I will tomorrow" (well I didn't write them but).  She is a keeper, just remember that you need to be a keeper too!
Christ it's getting deep in here   I'd better roll up my pant legs so I don't get....poo poo on them

Hey Skeets. you must be married to my wifes clone She got me a shimano Compre rod and a Curado 300E and 100 gift card from sail.Then she got all my friends and familly to get me sail cards of various amounts.Well, turns out i had enough for the humminbird 587 Ci HD sonar/GPS i was slobbering over every time i went into the store.We are lucky dudes Skeets. I tell mine that every day...do you
Great lady you have there Dann. Has anyone ever mentioned how great the chili that she makes is??  Enjoy the new sled and lures!
do you recall what the price was on the clam base camp? did they have any other pop up huts the same size/ style?

it was the big double hut $449.99 http://www.basspro.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/Navigation?hvarSearchString=clam+hut&storeId=10151&catalogId=10001&langId=-1&CMID=TOP_SEARCH_GO&scSearched=true&x=16&y=11
Should have been here this morning  BTW, I know your wife and she is one of the keepers!
Yep I know   Just playin with you guys

I have 400 in BPS gift cards burning a hole in my pocket just haven`t had a chance to get over there yet,but I`ll tell ya I aint gonna waste those cards on icefishing gear thats for sure!!! I probably waste them on another combo I don`t really need!!!
awesome dan that's the way we should be treated
Gotta love when the wife does that!  Thats how I got my new camera set up lol
